verses.verse: A Prayer of Moses the man of God. <S%H136>Lord<s%>, thou hast been our <S%H4583>dwelling-place<s%> In <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

Before the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were brought <S%H3205>forth<s%>, Or ever thou hadst <S%H2342>formed<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8398>world<s%>, Even from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>, thou art <S%H410>God<s%>.

For a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%> Are but <S%H3117>as<s%> <S%H865>yesterday<s%> when it is <S%H5674>past<s%>, And as a <S%H821>watch<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>.
Thou carriest them away as with a <S%H2229>flood<s%>; they are as a <S%H8142>sleep<s%>: In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> they are like <S%H2682>grass<s%> which groweth <S%H2498>up<s%>.
In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> it <S%H6692>flourisheth<s%>, and groweth <S%H2498>up<s%>; In the <S%H6153>evening<s%> it is cut <S%H4135>down<s%>, and <S%H3001>withereth<s%>.
For we are <S%H3615>consumed<s%> in thine <S%H639>anger<s%>, And in thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> are we <S%H926>troubled<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7896>set<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> before <S%H5956>thee<s%>, Our secret sins in the <S%H3974>light<s%> of thy <S%H6440>countenance<s%>.
For all our <S%H3117>days<s%> are passed <S%H6437>away<s%> in thy <S%H5678>wrath<s%>: We <S%H3615>bring<s%> our <S%H8141>years<s%> to an end as a <S%H1899>sigh<s%>.

The <S%H3117>days<s%> of our <S%H8141>years<s%> are <S%H7657>threescore<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H7657>ten<s%>, Or even by reason of <S%H1369>strength<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>; Yet is their <S%H7296>pride<s%> but <S%H5999>labor<s%> and <S%H205>sorrow<s%>; For it is <S%H2440>soon<s%> <S%H1468>gone<s%>, and we fly <S%H5774>away<s%>.
Who <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> the <S%H5797>power<s%> of thine <S%H639>anger<s%>, And thy <S%H5678>wrath<s%> according to the fear that is due unto <S%H3374>thee<s%>?
So <S%H3045>teach<s%> us to <S%H4487>number<s%> our <S%H3117>days<s%>, That we may <S%H935>get<s%> us a <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
Return <S%H7725><s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; How <S%H5162>long<s%>? And let it repent thee concerning thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
Oh <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> us in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> with thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, That we may <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> all our <S%H3117>days<s%>.
Make us <S%H8055>glad<s%> according to the <S%H3117>days<s%> wherein thou hast <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> <S%H8141>us<s%>, And the years wherein we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
Let thy <S%H6467>work<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, And thy <S%H1926>glory<s%> upon their <S%H1121>children<s%>.

And let the <S%H5278>favor<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> be upon <S%H3559>us<s%>; And establish thou the <S%H4639>work<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon <S%H4639>us<s%>; Yea, the work of our <S%H3027>hands<s%> establish thou <S%H3559>it<s%>.
